snippet.title: Project '06 - Silver Release
snippet.description:
The third installment of Project '06's episodic releases and the full release of Silver's Trial Campaign accompanied by Sonic's & Shadow's Trial Campaigns with all kinds of improvements and enhancements!

This release contains every stage available in Silver's, Shadow's and Sonic's stories.

It's been long overdue, with each release, the project continues to grow in almost every way. To say this release in specific was harder to work on than the last one would be an understatement, so from me and all who helped in this release, we hope you enjoy this new release!

Notes:
As is usual with these episodic releases, save datas from previous versions of the game won't work, sucks I know, hopefully I can change that soon enough.

(UPDATED TO SILVER RELEASE PATCH V1.3)
Download:
https://drive.google.com/file/d/1AeESgxJDeXim_DQT5Q69x5PNxCoFtq_2/view?usp=sharing
Mirrors:
https://drive.google.com/file/d/1QhV050X-5bV_0QTav9NXydKU3rMdGVcw/view?usp=sharing
https://drive.google.com/file/d/1UEvMZPNGKbvEordDUbWsPWFoXvum0GK1/view?usp=sharing
https://drive.google.com/file/d/1y3nYg7cGzTpiCM_jiUmyCws4cvaEFil-/view?usp=sharing
ANOTHER Mirror:
https://www.mediafire.com/file/65cux9zxuvsr89k/Project_06_-_Silver_Release_%2528Patch_v1.3%2529.zip/file

Editing and composition by ChaosX.
Animated cutscenes exclusive for this video by @Sonicpox 
In-game footage recorded by @fishly1016 & @BeatzYT
